articles.description: Meta's LlamaCon was all about undercutting OpenAI.
articles.content: On Tuesday, Meta held its first-ever AI developer conference, LlamaCon, at its Menlo Park, California headquarters. The company announced the launch of a consumer-facing Meta AI chatbot app, which wi… [+3016 chars]

articles.title: Google Takes Aim at Duolingo With AI Tools To Help You Learn New Languages - CNET
articles.description: The tech giant is the latest company to adopt AI tools in order to teach foreign languages -- but it isn't the first.
articles.content: Google is debuting three new AI experiments that are intended to help users learn foreign languages on the go. The tools utilize Google's Gemini large language model to identify objects and situation… [+3067 chars]
